name: The Pyrofrost
description:
I was messing with the particle system in Game Maker Studio 2, and was using physics and movement inspired by Celeste, and decided to keep working on it. I may stop if i grow bored of it.

The name, The Pyrofrost, is probably temporary. It may change with the story, which is still undecided. I have a vague idea, but it's still quite early in development. I've done 13 levels, after which the game closes. They aren't consistently difficult, and are mostly temporary to test the different level assets.

Note: I haven't added in any audio assets for the initial release.

If you notice any bugs, please inform me!
